mil5.5.1:3.5: Aniketamasanthavam, etam ve munidassanan’ti, tena hi ‘vihare karaye ramme, vasayettha bahussute’ti yam vacanam, tam miccha.
mil5.5.1:3.7: ‘vihare karaye ramme, vasayettha bahussute’ti, tena hi ‘santhavato bhayam jatam, niketa jayate rajo.
mil5.5.1:3.8: Aniketamasanthavam, etam ve munidassanan’ti tampi vacanam miccha.
mil5.5.1:3.9: Ayampi ubhato kotiko panho tavanuppatto, so taya nibbahitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.1:4.8: Aniketamasanthavam, etam ve munidassanan’ti, tam sabhavavacanam asesavacanam nissesavacanam nippariyayavacanam samananucchavam samanasaruppam samanappatirupam samanaraham samanagocaram samanappatipada samanappatipatti.
mil5.5.1:4.9: Yatha, maharaja, arannako migo aranne pavane caramano niralayo aniketo yathicchakam sayati;
mil5.5.1:4.10: evameva kho, maharaja, bhikkhuna ‘santhavato bhayam jatam, niketa jayate rajo.
mil5.5.1:5.2: ‘vihare karaye ramme, vasayettha bahussute’ti, tam dve atthavase sampassamanena bhagavata bhanitam.
mil5.5.1:5.4: Viharadanam nama sabbabuddhehi vannitam anumatam thomitam pasattham, tam te viharadanam datva jatijaramarana parimuccissantiti.
mil5.5.1:6.1: Puna caparam vihare vijjamane bhikkhuniyo byattasanketa bhavissanti, sulabham dassanam dassanakamanam, anikete duddassana bhavissantiti.
mil5.5.1:6.3: Ime dve atthavase sampassamanena bhagavata bhanitam—
mil5.5.1:6.4: ‘vihare karaye ramme, vasayettha bahussute’ti, na tattha buddhaputtena alayo karaniyo nikete”ti.
